title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: These Regulations may be cited as the Health Insurance Act 1994
text_raw:
1. 

(1) 

These Regulations may be cited as the Health Insurance Act 1994 

(Section 11E(2)) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1st day of January, 2025. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health insurance act 1994 (section 11e(2)) (amendment) regulation 2024 (2) regulation shall come operation 1st day january 2025 interpretation

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations, unless the context otherwise requires—
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations, unless the context otherwise requires— 

“Act of 1994” means the Health Insurance Act 1994 (No. 16 of 1994) ; 

“advanced cover” has the same meaning as that provided for in section 11E(4) 
of the Act of 1994; 

“Authority” means The Health Insurance Authority; and 

“relevant contract” has the meaning assigned to it by section 125A of the Stamp 
Duties Consolidation Act 1999. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and is also used 
in the Act of 1994 shall have in these Regulations the same meaning as it has in 
that Act unless the contrary intention appears. 

(3) A reference in these Regulations— 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

to any other enactment shall, unless the context otherwise 
requires, be construed as a reference to that enactment as 
amended or extended by any other enactment, 

a reference to a Regulation is a reference to a Regulation of these 
Regulations unless it is indicated that a reference to some other 
provision is intended, and 

a reference to a Schedule is a reference to a Schedule to these 
Regulations unless it is indicated that a reference to some other 
provision is intended. 

Amendment of Schedule to the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) (No. 
2) Regulations 2013

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: 6. (1) The following Regulations are hereby revoked—
text_raw:
6. (1) The following Regulations are hereby revoked— 

(a) The Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section11E(2)) (No. 3) 

Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 568 of 2013); 

(b) The Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) (No. 4) 

Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 496 of 2014); and 

(c) The Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) Regulations 

2016 (S.I. No. 120 of 2016).
text_norm: 6 (1) following regulation hereby revoked-- (a) health insurance act 1994 (section11e(2)) (no 3) regulation 2013 (s.i no 568 2013) (b) health insurance act 1994 (section 11e(2)) (no 4) regulation 2014 (s.i no 496 2014) (c) health insurance act 1994 (section 11e(2)) regulation 2016 (s.i no 120 2016)

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: 7. (1) The following Regulations are hereby revoked—
text_raw:
7. (1) The following Regulations are hereby revoked— 

(a) The Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) Regulations 

2020 (S.I. No. 538 of 2020); and 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [693] 

(b) Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) Regulations 2021 

(S.I. No. 696 of 2021). 

(2) Notwithstanding the revocation of the Regulations provided for in 
paragraph (1) of this Regulation, those Regulations shall continue to apply to 
any “relevant contract”, insofar as there may be any “relevant contract” subject 
to the provisions of subsection (2), (2A), (3) and where applicable, subsection 
(4), of section 11C, that may in accordance with the Regulations under section 
11F, entitle a health insurance undertaking to make a claim to the Authority to 
be paid an amount equal to its risk equalisation credits for the period to which a 
claim, under subsection (2A) of section 11C may relate. 

GIVEN under the Seal of The Health Insurance Authority, 
10 December 2024. 

PATRICIA BYRON, 

Chairperson/ Member. 

SÍLE HANLEY 

Authorised Officer. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [693] 5

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations are made by The Health Insurance Authority pursuant to 
Section 11E(2) of the Health Insurance Act 1994 , as inserted by section 15 of 
the Health Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012 and Section 8 of the Health 
Insurance (Amendment) Act 2013. These Regulations amend, by deletion, 
relevant contracts specified as deleted under this enactment in the Schedules to 
the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) (No. 2) Regulations 2013 (S.I. 
No. 203 of 2013), the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) (No. 5) 
Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 621 of 2014) and, the Health Insurance Act 1994 
(Section 11E(2)) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 378 of 2020). 

These Regulations revoke the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) (No. 
4) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 496 of 2014), Health Insurance Act 1994 
(Section11E(2)) (No. 3) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 568 of 2013) Health 
Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 538 of 2020) 
and Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(2)) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 696 
of 2021). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [693]
